languages.text: Друзианцы, пытавшиеся оказать сопротивление скверне, были вырезаны и изгнаны с Футфола. Впрочем, многие проповедники соблазнились искусом вседозволенности и, испятнав черные одежды вином и кровью, стали раздавать глумливые епитимьи и индульгенции новым братьям-еретикам.

The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.
languages.original_text: Друзианцы, пытавшиеся оказать сопротивление скверне, были вырезаны и изгнаны с Футфола. Впрочем, многие проповедники соблазнились искусом вседозволенности и, испятнав черные одежды вином и кровью, стали раздавать глумливые епитимьи и индульгенции новым братьям-еретикам.

traits.locale_text: Drusians, who tried to oppose the corruption, were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many of the preachers were enticed by the temptation of the absence of authority, staining their black robes with vine and blood, and started giving mock penances and pardons to their new heretic brothers.

Drusians, who tried to oppose the corruption, were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many of the preachers were enticed by the temptation of the absence of authority, staining their black robes with vine and blood, and started giving mock penances and pardons to their new heretic brothers.

The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic cohorts.

The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic cohorts.

The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

languages.text: 那些试图反对腐化的德鲁苏斯信徒要么遭到了屠杀，要么被驱逐出落脚港。与此同时，许多布道士被这样的无政府主义所吸引。他们用烈酒与鲜血玷污了他们的黑袍，带领他们新的异端信众进行虚伪的宽恕与忏悔。
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: 那些试图反对腐化的德鲁苏斯信徒要么遭到了屠杀，要么被驱逐出落脚港。与此同时，许多布道士被这样的无政府主义所吸引。他们用烈酒与鲜血玷污了他们的黑袍，带领他们新的异端信众进行虚伪的宽恕与忏悔。

languages.text: Die Drusianer, die versuchten, sich gegen die Verderbnis zu stellen, wurden abgeschlachtet und von Footfall verbannt. Viele Priester ließen sich aber von der Abwesenheit jeder Autorität verführen. Sie befleckten ihre schwarzen Roben mit Wein und Blut und begannen, angebliche Begnadigungen und Strafen für ihre neuen ketzerischen Brüder auszusprechen.
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: Die Drusianer, die versuchten, sich gegen die Verderbnis zu stellen, wurden abgeschlachtet und von Footfall verbannt. Viele Priester ließen sich aber von der Abwesenheit jeder Autorität verführen. Sie befleckten ihre schwarzen Roben mit Wein und Blut und begannen, angebliche Begnadigungen und Strafen für ihre neuen ketzerischen Anhänger auszusprechen.

languages.text: Les Drusiens qui tentèrent de s'opposer à la corruption furent massacrés et bannis de Castel, mais de nombreux prêcheurs se laissèrent séduire par l'absence d'autorité. Maculant leurs robes noires de vin et de sang, ils se mirent à accorder de faux pardons et à imposer des pénitences à leurs nouveaux camarades hérétiques.
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: Les Drusiens qui tentèrent de s'opposer à la corruption furent massacrés et bannis de Castel, mais de nombreux prêcheurs se laissèrent séduire par l'absence d'autorité. Maculant leurs robes noires de vin et de sang, ils se mirent à accorder de faux pardons et à imposer des pénitences à leurs nouvelles cohortes hérétiques.

languages.text: Los drusianos que intentaron oponerse a la corrupción acabaron masacrados o expulsados de Paso, pero la ausencia de autoridad atrajo a muchos predicadores. Manchando sus túnicas negras de vino y sangre, empezaron a repartir perdones falsos e imponer penas a sus nuevos hermanos herejes.
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: Los drusianos que intentaron oponerse a la corrupción acabaron masacrados o expulsados de Paso, pero la ausencia de autoridad atrajo a muchos predicadores. Manchando sus túnicas negras de vino y sangre, empezaron a repartir perdones falsos e imponer penas a sus nuevos seguidores herejes.

languages.text: 腐敗に反対しようとしたドルスス教は虐殺され、フットフォールから追放された。しかし、多くのプリーチャーたちは権威の不在に誘惑された。彼らは黒いローブをワインと血で染め、新たな異端の仲間たちに模擬的な赦免を与え、懺悔を課し始めた。
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: 腐敗に反対しようとしたドルスス教は虐殺され、フットフォールから追放された。しかし、多くのプリーチャーたちは権威の不在に誘惑された。彼らは黒いローブをワインと血で染め、新たな異端の仲間たちに模擬的な赦免を与え、懺悔を課し始めた。

languages.text: Yozlaşmaya karşı çıkmaya çalışan Drususçular katledildi ve Binliman'dan atıldı. Ancak birçok vaiz, otorite boşluğunu fırsat bildi. Siyah cübbelerini şarap ve kanla lekeleyerek sahte aflar düzenlemeye ve yeni kâfir kardeşlerine cezalar kesmeye başladılar.
languages.original_text: The Drusians who tried to oppose the corruption were slaughtered and banished from Footfall. Yet many preachers were enticed by the absence of authority. Staining their black robes with wine and blood, they started giving mock pardons and imposing penances on their new heretic brethren.

traits.locale_text: Yozlaşmaya karşı çıkmaya çalışan Drususçular katledildi ve Binliman'dan atıldı. Ancak birçok vaiz, otorite boşluğunu fırsat bildi. Siyah cübbelerini şarap ve kanla lekeleyerek sahte aflar düzenlemeye ve yeni kâfir kardeşlerine cezalar kesmeye başladılar.
